task.title: How to smell good for your peers
task.shortdesc: Smelling bad is not a good way to make friends. Use these steps to make sure you always smell fresh.

step.cmd: Fill the spray bottle halfway with lukewarm water.
Squeeze 3 drops of tea tree oil into the spray bottle.
Close the spray bottle and shake the contents for 10 seconds.
Mist your underarms with the tea tree oil solution.
